DOC.brief_title: A Study Comparing ABT-494 Monotherapy Methotrexate ( MTX ) Monotherapy Subjects With Rheumatoid Arthritis ( RA ) Who Have Inadequate Response MTX ( SELECT-MONOTHERAPY )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis RA > = 3 month . Subjects must oral parenteral MTX therapy > = 3 month stable dose > = 4 week prior first dose study drug . Must discontinue conventional synthetic diseasemodifying antirheumatic drug ( csDMARDs ) ( MTX ) > = 4 week prior first dose study drug . Meets follow minimum disease activity criterion : > = 6 swollen joint ( base 66 joint count ) > = 6 tender joint ( base 68 joint count ) Screening Baseline Visits . Prior exposure Janus kinase ( JAK ) inhibitor ( include limit tofacitinib , baricitinib , filgotinib ) . Prior exposure biological diseasemodifying antirheumatic drug ( bDMARDs ) . Current diagnosis inflammatory joint disease RA . Current diagnosis secondary Sjogren 's Syndrome permit .
